hackathon-description-text: AstonHack is back, and this time we’re opening up places for even more student hackers to enjoy 24 hours of designing, coding and making! Whether this will be your first hackathon or your 20th, AstonHack is great for all levels of experience!
hackathon-rules: You must write your code over the course of the event. Use of other open source code written outside of the event is allowed (and encouraged). Maximum team size is 4 people.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Amazon Echo Dot for each team member
An Arduino starter kit and Raspberry Pi starter kit for each team member
Sponsored by Majestic, Lego Mindstorms EV3 for each team member
Sponsored by Accenture, mini drone for each team member
Sponsored by Crate.io, Sphero BB-8 Droid for each team member
Sponsored by .Tech Domains, £40 Amazon voucher for each team member

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: I hope somebody gets this reference.

hackathon-description-header: Aston's student hackathon is back for its second year!
